Your call sign is already registered with ARES Edmonton.

If this is an error please send an email to planning@aresedmonton.net.
To start: Enter your Industry Canada callsign. Our system will validate it against their database and if found valid will fill in the remainder of the form from their database.
Your callsign is not registered with Industry Canada OR it is not a VE6 or VA6 call.
You must be a resident of Alberta, with a valid VE6 or VA6 callsign.

If you feel that this is an error please send an email to planning@aresedmonton.net.
